Package semsim.writing

Class ModelWriter

java.lang.Object
semsim.writing.ModelWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
CellMLwriter, JSimProjectFileWriter, MATLABwriter, MMLwriter, SBMLwriter, SemSimOWLwriter
public abstract class ModelWriter
extends java.lang.Object
Class for translating SemSim models into different modeling formats
Author:
mneal

  • Field Details

    • writelocation

      public ModelAccessor writelocation

  • Method Details

    • pointToSemSimLibrary

      public static void pointToSemSimLibrary​(SemSimLibrary lib)
      Sets the SemSimLibrary instance used when writing out models
      Parameters:
      lib - The SemSimLibrary instance to use

    • getRDFwriter

      public abstract AbstractRDFwriter getRDFwriter()
      Returns:
      The RDF writer used to output RDF-formatted SemSim annotations. RDF writers are only used when writing out standalone SBML or CellML models and when writing metadata files in OMEX archives.

    • encodeModel

      public abstract java.lang.String encodeModel()
      Returns:
      The translated model code

    • writeToStream

      public boolean writeToStream​(java.io.OutputStream stream)
      Write translated model code to an OutputStream
      Parameters:
      stream - An OutputStream
      Returns:
      False if the model translation process returned null, otherwise true

    • makeXMLContentFromString

      public static org.jdom.Content makeXMLContentFromString​(java.lang.String xml)
      Convert a String to an JDOM XML Content object
      Parameters:
      xml - XML code
      Returns:
      JDOM Content object representation of the XML code

    • setWriteLocation

      public void setWriteLocation​(ModelAccessor ma)
      Set the location for writing the translated code. If the location is an omex archive, enable OMEX metadata annotations.
      Parameters:
      ma - Location to store the code

    • getWriteLocation

      public ModelAccessor getWriteLocation()
      Returns:
      Location where the translated code will be stored

    • OMEXmetadataEnabled

      public boolean OMEXmetadataEnabled()
      Returns true if the OMEX metadata flag is enabled, false otherwise.
